data.eml:eml: Platiana cechovskyi sp. nov. from Malaysia, a remarkable new member of Dimini (Elateridae: Dendrometrinae) with strongly serrate antennae

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kundrata, Robin, Sormova, Eliska (2018): Platiana cechovskyi sp. nov. from Malaysia, a remarkable new member of Dimini (Elateridae: Dendrometrinae) with strongly serrate antennae. Zootaxa 4524 (1): 132-138, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4524.1.10
